bug.author: zoenagy235
bug.description:
For me the current release almost always generates weird pixels on vag area, usually green/yellow colored. Using default parameters. It never happens for boobs. I'm already using split colored background. Happens for square images too. Is it because of low quality jpg saving at one of the stages? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63315823/79066171-a81ed200-7cad-11ea-9752-6a0a9759136e.jpg></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63315823/79066169-a0f7c400-7cad-11ea-8ca4-9ba51c64ce91.jpg></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
